text: Mana Omusatsa omusuubili mubandu ba Firaun owafisa obusuubili bubwe naboola mbu: “koo mwira butswa Omundu shichila okhuboolasa mbu Nyasaye nomulesi wanje ne abetseele nende abwatoto okhurula khu Nyasaye wenyu, ne nali mbu nomubeyi mumuleshe nobubeyi bubwe , ne nali owatoto kamulakanga kalamunyoola, toto Nyasaye shalunjisinjia ulia wabura eshichelo Omubeyi tawe.”
